hadiths.text: Ja'far reported on the authority of his father:that he asked Jabir b. 'Abdullah when the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) observed Jumu'a prayer. He said: He used to observe prayer, and we then went (back) to our camels and gave them rest. 'Abdullah made this addition in his narration: "Till the sun passed the meridian. and the camels used for carrying water (took rest)

chapter.ara-name: باب صَلاَةِ الْجُمُعَةِ حِينَ تَزُولُ الشَّمْسُ
chapter.eng-name: Jumu`ah prayer is when the sun has passed its zenith
